text: He entered a dog in a butcher's shop, and noticing that the butcher was very busy with his customers, he picked up a piece of meat and ran out. And the butcher turned and saw him fleeing, and was not able to do any more, and said, Behold, my friend, wherever I find thee, I will look on thee. Avoid accidents before they happen.
title: El perro y el carnicero
author: nan Esopo
